name: Ronin (itch) (GranJ, Elia, AlvaroVello96, AlVance)
description:
Ronin

It's a single player game with a TopDown view  set in Feudal Japan where the player must end waves of enemies, each completed round gives an improvement of his choosing on the character to face waves with constantly increasing difficulty.

As you defeat hordes of enemies you will increase your power in the three main branches of your skills, dashes, defence and attack.

Controls: Contact: ayeayearts@gmail.com
